resources.string: Agree to the Free Traffic Service Agreement
The bound SIM card is not in the phone or the serial number of the SIM card has changed!
Insert the SIM card to view/enable Free Traffic
Possible causes: 1. System service may be busy 2. Operator service failure
Possible causes: 1. Free Traffic has not been enabled for this phone number in this phone 2. System service may be busy 3. Operator service failure
If you have any questions, please call %s or your operator
Traffic data is for reference only, for details refer to your local operator

"1. Ensure the number belongs to you 2. Check if the message was intercepted by security software 3. If the number has been deactivated or blocked by the operator, inquire with the operator 4. For more help, call customer service at 10109000"
Please enter a valid phone number
Please enter your bound phone number.
Please enter a valid verification code
Verification code has been sent to: %s, please input then follow the instructions
This phone did not receive the verification code or the code has expired.
"You have still not agreed to the Free Traffic Service Agreement. You must carefully read and agree to the agreement before binding."
Please visit the Mobile Business Hall for traffic inquiries.
Bind your phone number and get a Free Traffic package
Free Traffic service has been canceled.
Phone information could not be read, unable to collect Free Traffic
Card slot receiving the SMS verification code not detected.
The bound SIM card is not in the phone or the serial number of the SIM card has changed
Before binding, make sure this number can use mobile data on this device. After binding, you will not be able to change the number bound to Free Traffic
Accessing LeEco services now will incur data charges
Failed to get the SIM card information, please reboot your phone and try again
Phone information could not be read
Traffic this month has run out
SIM card has been pulled out, unable to use free traffic
Failed to activate the monthly renewal

This month Unicom opened free traffic service failed. Your phone number may have money owed or have not yet valid package this month and cannot be automatically opened free traffic service, please contact the local Unicom operator, query the status of your phone number. We will try to open again for you every day.
Failed to activate the monthly renewal for traffic-free services
Accessing LeEco services now will incur data charges
Your Free Traffic allowance for this month has run out. Additional this will incur data charges.
We recommend that you use the CMCC Client. This allows you to check your Free Traffic use at any time.
You can check your Free Traffic use by going to My Le - Free Traffic Management.

"Your phone number has not yet effective packages or overdue bills, temporarily unable to open free traffic service, please contact the local mobile operators, track the status of your mobile phone number.
We will send an app to the mobile daily, please timely attention to opening state."

"Your phone number has not yet effective packages or overdue bills, temporarily unable to open free traffic service, please contact the local unicom operators, track the status of your mobile phone number.
We will send an app to the mobile daily, please timely attention to opening state."
Current phone number does not support the opening of free traffic.
Free flow service cycle according to the nature of the month.It is recommended that you open service early this month.
Accessing LeEco services now will incur data charges
Sorry, unable to obtain your mobile number, please enter it manually
Select the mobile number that you want to bind with
Your mobile number does not meet the activation conditions of free traffic. For details, please refer to the business scope of the free traffic service.
No SIM card has been detected, please activate after inserting a SIM card
The SIM card that received the verification code is not your selected SIM card, please return and perform again, thank you!
Sorry, your mobile phone does not have access to the free traffic service
Server errors, please try again later

"1. This mobile number has been used on another phone for activating free-traffic services, and this activation continues to consume the validity of traffic-free services on the other phone. 2. You are recommended to activate traffic-free services at the beginning of a month as their service cycle is calculated by natural month."
The traffic-free service has been claimed with this mobile number on another phone. No reactivation is required.
The verification will take a long time to complete. Please view the activation status later.

"During the valid period of the service, you can watch LeEco's content on the Le app, the Live desktop and the LeView desktop. To view traffic usage, you are recommended to use the China Telecom mobile client or consult your local China Telecom business hall. Read the Instructions for Use for more information."

"Possible failure reasons: 1. The system server is busy. 2. A failure occurred on the carrier's server. 3. China Telecom FlyYoung 4G custom packages, personal custom packages, internet surfing cards, duration-type packages and non-China Telecom cards are not supported for activating the traffic-free service. 4. The traffic-free service has been claimed with this phone or this mobile number."
%s of China Telecom provincial targeted traffic per month

"1. The system server is busy. 2. A failure occurred on the carrier's server. 3. China Telecom FlyYoung 4G custom packages, personal custom packages, internet surfing cards, duration-type packages and non-China Telecom cards are not supported for activating the traffic-free service. 4. The traffic-free service has been claimed with this phone or this mobile number."
To view traffic usage, you are recommended to use the China Telecom mobile client or consult your local China Telecom business hall.
The verification code has expired or the server is not working properly. Please activate again.
The busy network may cause a delay in receiving the text, returns will make the codes invalid
